00029 #ifndef __HardwareIndexBuffer__
00030 #define __HardwareIndexBuffer__
00031 
00032 // Precompiler options
00033 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00034 #include "OgreHardwareBuffer.h"
00035 #include "OgreSharedPtr.h"
00036 
00037 namespace Ogre {
00038 
00040     class _OgreExport HardwareIndexBuffer : public HardwareBuffer
00041     {
00042         public:
00043             enum IndexType {
00044                 IT_16BIT,
00045                 IT_32BIT
00046             };
00047 
00048         protected:
00049             IndexType mIndexType;
00050             size_t mNumIndexes;
00051             size_t mIndexSize;
00052 
00053         public:
00055             HardwareIndexBuffer(IndexType idxType, size_t numIndexes, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage,
00056                 bool useSystemMemory, bool useShadowBuffer);
00057             ~HardwareIndexBuffer();
00059             IndexType getType(void) const { return mIndexType; }
00061             size_t getNumIndexes(void) const { return mNumIndexes; }
00063             size_t getIndexSize(void) const { return mIndexSize; }
00064 
00065             // NB subclasses should override lock, unlock, readData, writeData
00066     };
00067 
00068 
00070     class _OgreExport HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr : public SharedPtr<HardwareIndexBuffer>
00071     {
00072     public:
00073         HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr() : SharedPtr<HardwareIndexBuffer>() {}
00074         explicit HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr(HardwareIndexBuffer* buf);
00075     };
00076 }
00077 #endif
